mapper.update: update material set material_name = #{materialName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, material_num = #{materialNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, material_description = #{materialDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where material_id = #{materialId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select material_id, material_name, material_num, material_description, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, delete_flag from material where material_id = #{materialId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select material_id, material_name, material_num, material_description, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, delete_flag from material
